author: larde.victor
title: Ubuntu Contributionism
description: Imagine a perfect world full of harmony and abundance. The kind of world most of us have dreamed of all our lives.
solution: This world is possible and we are creating it for ourselves – not somewhere in the distant future, but now, in our own lifetime.
experience: Researcher - Scientist - Author - Activist - Humanitarian. Senior Financial Planner. Coach in blockchain & cryptocurrency. Business Planner.
